title: Violence erupts on Poland-Belarus border as Polish guards fire water cannon on migrants throwing rocks
content:
1. Violence erupts on Poland-Belarus border as Polish guards fire water cannon on migrants throwing rocks  CNN
  2. Poland border crisis: EU to widen Belarus sanctions as row intensifies  BBC News
  3. Migrants who fled Middle East for Belarus now showing up in Germany  CBS News
  4. Poland, Lithuania and Latvia consider triggering NATO's Article 4 over the Belarus border crisis  CNN
  5. Stranded in the freezing darkness of a Polish forest - BBC News  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ポーランドとベラルーシの国境で、ポーランドの警備員が石を投げた移民に水鉄砲を撃つという暴力事件が発生しました。
波兰-白俄罗斯边境爆发暴力事件，波兰卫兵向投掷石块的移民发射水炮
波蘭-白俄羅斯邊境爆發暴力事件，波蘭衛兵向投擲石塊的移民發射水炮
